pages.text: $(#630000)Given how long COTH takes, I've created a mechanism to hasten the process substantially.$(br2)All I need is to jab said creature with a Dirty Needle, and the concoction inside should take care of the rest. From there, it should only take a few seconds.

$(#630000)These are also extremely easy to make in bulk, just some samples and a bit of glass should do the trick. I do find, however, that parasitic materials are much easier to work with when making these, and should yield more as a result.
$(#630000)I've also engineered the substance inside to ravage any breakable resistance the victim may have. Now I don't need to attack them after the fact!
